title: Apple Slices & Almond Butter
description: Simple, satisfying, and portable. Two tablespoons of almond butter with a sliced apple. The 3PM savior.
ingredients: 1 medium apple (Honeycrisp or Fuji work great)
steps: Wash and slice apple into wedges.
Serve with almond butter for dipping.
Optional: sprinkle cinnamon on top or drizzle with a tiny bit of honey.
